title: The End of Battlefront II Drama (For Now) - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.17.17
description:
Tim and Greg detail DICE removing microtransactions and if this was a win for gamers.

00:04:20 - Housekeeping
Vote for Andrea right now. We’re going to. Google “trending gamer vote.”
Andy Serkis vid is up on patreon.com/kindafunnygames
The Roper Report   -
00:05:30 - Battlefront II Drops Microtransactions
00:17:30 - NPD in for October 2017, via IGN
00:18:30 - Ubisoft safe from Vivendi for now, via Reuters
00:24:30 - London’s Golden Joysticks got some winners
00:28:00 - The official list of upcoming games
 Reader mail   -
00:32:15 - Why isn't anyone talking about the Star Wars Campaign? - Javier Bonet-Ruiz
00:34:30 - With Ni No Kuni 2 coming out January 19th, what are some reasons the company would decide not to put the first game out on new gen consoles? - Jeffy Jeff jeff
00:36:35 - Digital vs physical games - Eric K
00:48:50 - What gets you to play a mobile game? - Danny V
00:51:30 -  Do you think that this could mean that we'll see the long rumoured TMNT title from Rocksteady in the near future? - Anthony
00:53:30 - Squad Up Nick PC:AwesomeNick#1458 (Discord)
00:54:18 - Greg’s Pie in the sky platinum
00:55:15 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Tim (Also, only Monday and Tuesday shows next week)

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
